prompt: Edit the uploaded photo as an ultra-realistic spa beauty portrait. PRESERVE: Face identity 100% identical — no changes to facial features, proportions, eyes, nose, lips, skin texture, expression. Eyelashes and eyebrows exactly as original — no modification. ADD: Soft pink terry towel wrapped spa-style around head — no logos, no text, no embroidery. Soft pink translucent hydrogel eye patches, glossy finish. SKIN: Ultra-detailed natural texture — visible pores, microtexture, natural imperfections. Natural freckles. Glowing hydrated skin, dewy finish. No smoothing, no airbrushing. SETUP: Clean white studio background, soft diffused light. High-end editorial beauty photography. Sharp focus. 4:5 format, original dimensions.
